    • Indy Add-on Pass If you already have an unlimited season pass at an Indy Pass partner resort, you can save 30% on your Indy Base Pass.
    • Indy + Add-on Pass Go full Indy with the Indy Add-On+ Pass. All the same goodness as the Indy Add-On Pass, but with NO BLACKOUT DATES.

Our Resorts

Leave behind the mega lines and the mega prices. The Indy Pass offers two days each across 230+ uncrowded, authentic ski destinations across the United States, Canada, Europe and Japan. From the moment you park your car or hop on your first chair, youll notice something different. These independent ski areas are incredibly diverse but all have one thing in commoneach offers smaller crowds, lower costs, and endlessly authentic vibes.
